snippet: Officials removed some of the cars involved in the derailment on Friday, which injured 19 people, and restored service to the lines, though more disruptions were planned to remove the remaining cars.
abstract: Partial local service is temporarily restored to subway lines running along Queens Boulevard in Queens, day after 19 people were injured in worst derailment in New York City subway system in over two decades; express service remains suspended.
lead_paragraph: Officials removed some of the cars involved in the derailment on Friday, which injured 19 people, and restored service to the lines, though more disruptions were planned to remove the remaining cars.

headline.main: Partial Service Resumes After Subway Derailment in Queens
